member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID
member.summary: A 125Khz RFID reader module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

example.para: The following example uses a object to display the ID of a swiped RFID card.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID.CardIDReceived
member.summary: Event raised when the module reads a valid ID.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID.CardIDBadChecksum
member.summary: Event raised when the module reads an invalid or the checksum does not match.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID.CardIDReceivedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RFID.CardIDBadChecksumEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the event.
